title: 求解答！Mod整合包没有崩溃，但是开档后不生怪

replies.author: 潇潇染夕
replies.txt_content: 试试在命令方块里输入/gamerule doMobSpawning false指令

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:

/gamerule doMobSpawning true复制代码
即可开启原版怪物生成
